rooms.name: Entry Hall and Wheelchair Accessible Entrance
rooms.description: A spacious entry hall with a wheelchair-accessible ramp integrated into the design, ensuring easy access to all areas.

rooms.name: Open Plan Living and Kitchen Area
rooms.description: A luxurious open-plan area merging the kitchen with living space. The design includes a seamless flow between cooking and leisure areas, with modern appliances and ample storage.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: An integrated dining area within the open-plan layout, providing a harmonious space for meals and social gatherings.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom designed with privacy in mind, offering ample natural light from windows aligned according to Vastu.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: A fully accessible bathroom designed for wheelchair users, featuring grab bars, non-slip flooring, and a walk-in shower.

rooms.name: Study/Office Area
rooms.description: A dedicated area for work or study with ample lighting, storage solutions, and ergonomic design ensuring comfort.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: A wide, accessible main entrance door with a ramp leading into the entry hall, ensuring smooth transition for wheelchair users.

openings.name: Living Area Windows
openings.description: Strategically placed windows to maximize natural light in the living and kitchen areas, ensuring alignment with Vastu principles.

openings.name: Patio Balcony
openings.description: An accessible balcony providing outdoor space and ventilation, integrated into the living area design.
